order.same:
Bluetooth 4.2
Arc and body: hardened steel
Body: aluminium
Surface covering: polyolefin
Arc diameter: 18 mm
Space inside shackle: 10 x 16 cm
order.price: You can order as soon as we reach agreement about mass production.
order.contact: To get the lock first fill the contacts.
order.name: Name

contact.app: Apps will be available as soon as production completes. For testing purpose please write to

smart.p:
• Bluetooth control
  • Accelerometer and temperature sensors
  • 10000 open/close or 2 years in standby

highSecure.p:
• It blocks 2 ends of the shackle
  • Hardened steel
  • Sensitive cover. If it’s damaged you’ll be notified

share.p:
• Register in app, attach your bank card and sign contract. Detailed information will appear after crowdfunding campaign
  • In app make parking zones, where you’d like users to leave bike after riding
  • In app change your lock from own to shared
  • Wait for rental money

rent.p:
• In app buy minutes
  • Find suitable bike on the map
  • Enable bluetooth, press camera icon and scan QR-code
  • Press button on the lock for 1-2 seconds. You should take notification in app and lock should open
  • You can park your bike while riding. Park bike and press lock button - lock will close but riding won’t end

end.p:
• Enable bluetooth, press camera icon and scan QR-code
  • Park bike and press lock button - lock will close and riding will end

restrictions.p: We do not recommend to use lock at temperatures below zero: accumulator can freeze and lock block.
